categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Egon Reich was a male Zabrak who was a friend of Roan Novachez, Pasha, and Bill at the Jedi academy in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. Once, during a Jedi Combat Acrobatics class, he was called upon to do a somersault, but ended up knocking into Roan and another student (Shi-Fara), an experience Roan described as being like bowling.
